DOC.detailed_description: Eligible subject undergo either office-based operating room-based procedure surgery . The approximately 620 subject randomize 2:2:1 fashion one three treatment group ( 248 subject randomize Cocaine HCl 4 % solution , 248 subject randomize Cocaine HCl 10 % , 124 subject randomize placebo solution ) pre-procedure give one application assign test product Von Frey filament test occur application .
